creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
text: A horizontal-format painting done in black, white, and gray. On the left side a group of Black marchers recede into the distance and hold up a sign that says "We Shall [overcome]". On the left a trio of hooded figures, a snarling, barking dog, and a man holding out a skull confront the Black people. A white cross is visible at the top and a structure is showwn on fire in the background.
title: Untitled (Civil Rights March)
